SELECT c.chat_no, c.chat_title, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_group g2 WHERE g2.chat_no = c.chat_no) AS group_size, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_content cc WHERE cc.chat_no = c.chat_no AND cc.chat_content_no > COALESCE(( SELECT rs.chat_content_no FROM chat_read_status rs WHERE rs.chat_no = c.chat_no AND rs.member_nickname = #{memberNickname} ), 0) ) AS not_read, ( SELECT MAX(cc.chat_content_no) FROM chat_content cc WHERE cc.chat_no = c.chat_no ) AS latest_content_no FROM chat c JOIN chat_group g ON c.chat_no = g.chat_no WHERE g.member_nickname = #{memberNickname} ORDER BY latest_content_no DESC
